articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Moranbong Band together with Participants in Military Parade
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Moranbong Band together with Participants in Military Parade 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Moranbong Band gave a performance for the participants in the military parade for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, enjoyed the performance together with the participants in the military parade. 
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Jang Jong Nam, Ri Yong Gil, Mun Kyong Dok, O Il Jong, Kim Kyong Ok and Kim Yong Chol. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with Ri Sol Ju appeared in the auditorium. He acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the audience. He warmly congratulated the participants in the military parade on fully demonstrating the spirit of Songun Korea to surely build a thriving socialist nation on this land shining the undying exploits the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by winning the victory in the war and their feats performed by achieving the  victory in the Songun revolution.
					
					 It began with the playing of the national anthem. Put on the stage were instrumental music and song "Go All Out for Victory in the War", light music "Mungyong Pass", female solo and pangchang "Tell, Fireworks of War Victory", instrumental music and song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", female chorus "Tribute to Victors in Great Annals" and female chorus "July 27 March" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers impressively showed that the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was a victory of the Juche-oriented military idea, distinguished strategy and tactics and superb commanding art of President Kim Il Sung and it was a shining victory of the might of the unity and cohesion of the army and people of the DPRK closely united around the party and the leader and their indomitable spirit. 
					
					 When the august images of the great generalissimos were projected on the screen and the voice of the President making a speech was heard, the audience broke into loud applause and was overwhelmed with excitement. 
					
					 When the song "The leader to whom we entrust our destiny and future" was presented and the image of the tender-hearted Marshal Kim Jong Un was projected on the screen, the audience overcome with excitement rose from their seats and enthusiastically clapped their hands and sang in chorus, shaking the theatre. 
					
					   As the performance was over, Kim Jong Un waved back to the performers and audience, congratulating the artistes on their successful performance. 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the participants in the military parade would discharge their sacred missions and duties in the struggle to defend socialism and the drive to build a thriving nation in the same heroic fighting spirit as displayed in the 1950s.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Verbal Message in Memory of Jong Mong Hon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Verbal Message in Memory of Jong Mong Hon
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a verbal message in memory of Jong Mong Hon, former chairman of Hyundai Group of south Korea, on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of his death.
					 Won Tong Yon, vice-chairman of the Korea Asia-Pacific Committee, courteously conveyed the message to Hyon Jong Un, chairwoman of Hyundai Group of south Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said in the message that Jong Mong Hon explored the road of national reconciliation and cooperation and did a great work for developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving the country's reunification. He prayed for the soul of Jong and hoped that Chairwoman Hyon Jong Un and other family members of Jong and the group will see everything go well. 
					
					 Hyon expressed most heartfelt thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un for sending the verbal message and extended warm gratitude to him, reflecting the best wishes from the family and the group.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends His Autographs to Ex-Service Personnel, People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends His Autographs to Ex-Service Personnel, People 
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent his autographs to service personnel who completed the terms of their services in the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and other people of various units in reply to their letters expressing their resolutions to display patriotism in their worksites for the prosperity of the country at "the speed on Masik Pass" in hearty response to the appeal of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un read the letter sent to him by those ex-service personnel, leaving for their new posts, and sent them the following autograph: "Always live in the same manner as during your military service! You should always become standard-bearers, buglers and shock brigades in the way of ushering in a new era of prosperity as required by our party. Kim Jong Un, July 11, 2013."
					
					 He sent the following autograph to people in Changsong County who pledged to be always strong roots in mountain of treasures in reply to their letter: "Changsong should be a land where more changes take place than the previous year and a land of bliss where people laugh in happiness in the future, too, as they sing in a song. Kim Jong Un, July 11, 2013."
					
					 He sent the following autograph to the employees of the Kanggye Rabbit-breeding Farm in reply to their letter: "Thank you for faithfully fulfilling your revolutionary tasks. Kim Jong Un, July 11, 2013."
					
					 He also sent the following autograph to the employees of a workshop of the Nyongbyon Silk Mill in reply to their letter: "I am very pleased to know about your good resolution to be eternal Nyongbyon girls weaving silk. Comrades! Let us serve the people and the future! Kim Jong Un, July 11, 2013."
					
					 He sent the following autograph to a newly-married couple of Ko Kum Song and Cha Hyo Sim in Kumya County, who had the honor of being reborn under the care of the mother party, in reply to their letter: "Congratulations on your wedding. I wish you happiness with many sons and daughters. Kim Jong Un, July 11, 2013."
					
					 He sent the following autograph to a party official who helped the couple lead a worthy life with loving care as a mother would do as desired by the party, true to the politics of love for the people enforced by the Workers' Party of Korea: "Comrade Secretary of a primary party committee who took warm care of comrades Ko Kum Song and Cha Hyo Sim as a mother would do! Thank you very much. Kim Jong Un, July 11, 2013."

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Iran
						
 Tehran, August 3 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, arrived in Tehran on Saturday to attend the inaugural ceremony of  the Iranian president on the invitation of the government of the Islamic Republic of Iran.
					 He was accompanied by Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other suite members.
					
					 A guard of honor of Iranian army lined up at the airport to welcome them.
					
					 They were greeted by Soltani Far, advisor to the president, and officials concerned of the presidential office and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and DPRK Ambassador Jo In Chol to Iran and staff members of  the embassy there.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Brazilian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Brazilian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Sergio Rubens De Araujo Torres, national president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, on July 27.
					 The message said:
					
					 Pyongyang was destroyed and many Koreans were killed in the war which started on June 25, 1950 due to the U.S. foolish provocation against the DPRK and lasted till 1953.
					
					 The DPRK bravely stood up against the enemies, not yielding to them, and achieved truce, forcing them to halt their war actions.
					
					 The young DPRK and the Korean People's Army recorded a special chapter in the world history of wars by fighting against the U.S. which emerged the biggest military power after the Second World War and boasted of being "the strongest" in the world. This victory was a brilliant fruition of the distinguished military strategy of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Korean army and people completely rehabilitated the country in a brief span of time after the war by their devoted efforts under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea. They turned their country into a power with strong and developed economy, the capability to beat back the imperialists' invasion and defend national sovereignty and a war deterrent.
					
					 This year we are celebrating the 60th anniversary of the DPRK's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 We send solidarity to the DPRK in its efforts and just proposal to conclude a peace treaty, put an end to the U.S. hostile acts and sanctions against it and preserve peace on the Korean peninsula and to the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country on behalf of our party.
					
					 Please accept our sincere salute.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Indian National Seminar
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Indian National Seminar 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted on July 20 at the Indian national seminar for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The participants in the letter paid respect to the brave Korean soldiers who won an unforgettable victory in the war by defeating the U.S. imperialists and making them sign the Armistice Agreement, a disgraceful document admitting their defeat, on July 27, 1953.
					
					 They have a good knowledge of the courageous and self-sacrificing actions of the fraternal Koreans specially recorded in history and highly appreciate them, the letter said. The July 27, 1953 winners showed the world that they were strong and ready to offer their lives without hesitation to defend and glorify the freedom, honor and dignity of the country.
					
					 The participants vowed to fly higher the flag of victory under the great leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Party, Government Delegation Arrives in Malabo
articles.content:
DPRK Party, Government Delegation Arrives in Malabo
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- A DPRK party and government delegation led by Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, arrived in Malabo on Friday to visit Equatorial Guinea.
					 It was greeted at the airport by the governor of North Bioko Province, the vice mayor of Malabo, members of the National Council of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and other officials concerned, Kwak Ji Hwan, DPRK ambassador to the country, and his embassy officials.

articles.title: DPRK Red Cross Society Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Red Cross Society Delegation Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the DPRK Red Cross Society led by Deputy Executive Chairman of its Central Committee Paek Yong Ho returned home Saturday after taking part in the meeting of leading officials of Red Cross organizations in East Asia held in Hong Kong, China.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan headed by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, left here on Saturday after taking part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Lao Delegation
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Lao Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Central Committee of the National Construction Front of Laos led by Chairman Phandoaungchit Vongsa visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Saturday to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The guests paid tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in deep reverence for them.
					
					 They paid homage to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls that house cars, an electric car, boat and train coaches they used till the last moments of their lives during their field guidance and foreign trips.
					
					 The head of the delegation made the following entry in the visitor's book:
					
					 I was deeply moved to visit the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 They devoted their all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 The friendly relations between Laos and the DPRK provided by Kaysone Phomvihane and Kim Il Sung are growing stronger day by day under the deep care of Choummaly Sayasone and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Lao Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Lao Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Central Committee of the National Construction Front of Laos led by Chairman Phandoaungchit Vongsa visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung on Saturday.
					 Being briefed on the undying revolutionary career of the President and his patriotic and revolutionary family in Mangyongdae, the guests looked round the historic relics preserved there with great care.
					
					  The head of the delegation said Kim Il Sung was a great revolutionary who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years and dedicated his all to the struggle for the liberation and prosperity of the country.
					
					 After visiting the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the head of the delegation wrote in the visitor's book that the Korean people achieved a great victory in the war against the imperialist forces under the wise leadership of the President.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph and the United Front Tower.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The campers groups from various countries to participate in the 28th Songdowon International Children's Camping visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Saturday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: DPRK Cabinet Gives Reception for Winners of East Asian Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Cabinet Gives Reception for Winners of East Asian Cup
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Cabinet gave a reception at Okryu Restaurant Saturday for the women soccer team which won the 2013 East Asian Cup.
					 Present there were Kim Yang Gon, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Kim Jae Song, minister of Electronics Industry, officials in the fields of sports, officials concerned, players and coaches.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin made a congratulatory speech at the reception.
					
					 He congratulated the women footballers who made an honorable report to Marshal Kim Jong Un on the day of the great war victory and delighted the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 He called upon all the sportspersons to intensify the training and glorify the honor of the country with gold medals.
					
					 Footballer Ra Un Sim in her reply vowed to continue to display the honor of winner at international games with the conviction that a sports power is sure to be built thanks to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Memorial Service Held to Commemorate 10th Anniversary of Jong Mon Hon's Death
articles.content:
Memorial Service Held to Commemorate 10th Anniversary of Jong Mon Hon's Death
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- A memorial service to commemorate the 10th anniversary of death of Jong Mong Hon, former chairman of Hyundai Group of south Korea, took place at Mt. Kumgang resort on Saturday.
					 Present from the south side were Chairwoman of the group Hyon Jong Un, his widow, and those concerned of the group.
					
					 Present from the north side were Won Tong Yon, vice-chairman of the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee, Hwang Ho Yong, director of the DPRK Guidance Bureau of Special Zone for International Tour of Mt. Kumgang, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The participants laid bunches of flowers before the monument to the autograph of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il at the resort and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Wreaths in the name of the group and the committee and bunches of flowers were laid at the service.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Jong Mong Hon.
					
					 Hwang Ho Yong said in a memorial address that Jong Mong Hon together with Honorary Chairman Jong Ju Yong explored the road of reconciliation and cooperation with warm patriotism and devotedly worked for developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving the country's reunification.
					
					 He recalled that Kim Jong Il set store by Jong Mong Hon's patriotism and showed deep love and trust for him.
					
					 He noted that supreme leader Kim Jong Un is paying deep attention to the family and the group and showed warm loving care on the 10th anniversary of Jong Mon Hon's death, true to the noble will of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Those concerned of the group evinced their resolution to make every effort to realize the great intention of national reconciliation and cooperation so much desired by Jong Ju Yong and Jong Mong Hon and resume the tour of Mt. Kumgang as early as possible.

articles.title: Brazilian Party Leader Vows to Develop Friendship with WPK
articles.content:
Brazilian Party Leader Vows to Develop Friendship with WPK
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Ri Hwa Gun, DPRK ambassador to Brazil, paid a farewell call on Renato Ravello, national chairman of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, on July 25. 
					 At the meeting Renato Ravello said that the successes made by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people in socialist construction, the effort for national reunification and anti-U.S. struggle under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un are greatly encouraging not only the Brazilian Communist Party but also progressive mankind. 
					
					 Fully supporting the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle is a noble duty and steadfast determination of the Brazilian Communist Party, he said. 
					
					 He expressed the will to make positive efforts to develop of friendship between the two parties.

articles.title: National Sci-Tech Presentations, Show Held
articles.content:
National Sci-Tech Presentations, Show Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The 10th national sci-tech presentation and show in the field of nano-technology, national sci-tech presentation in the IT field and national sci-tech presentation in the field of mining industry took place from July 30 to August 2. They were sponsored by the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were officials, scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers, postgraduates and three-revolution team members of scientific and educational institutions and industrial establishments.
					
					 The national sci-tech presentation and show in the field of nano-technology were held at the State Nano-technology Center.
					
					 Presented there were at least 130 papers and more than 220 kinds of products in the fields of agriculture, light industry, basic industry and medical science. 
					
					 Some 250 papers for rapidly developing information service, program development, security technology and satellite communications were introduced at the national sci-tech presentation in the IT field, which was held to mark the 50th anniversary of the Central Information Agency for Science and Technology.

articles.title: Technical Consultation on Telemedicine Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Technical Consultation on Telemedicine Held in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The WHO South-East Asia Regional Technical Consultation on Telemedicine took place here from July 30 to August 1.
					 The consultation was attended by local health officials, Rajesh Bhatia, acting regional director for WHO South-East Asia and other foreign professionals.
					
					 The speakers at the consultation reviewed experiences gained in carrying on telemedicine in their countries and touched on the advantages of the kind of medical service, elaborating on ways for its further development.
					
					 Also put up for discussion were the issues of upgrading the abilities of health workers, intensifying the hygienic information activities on the network and developing e-health in line with regional strategy for it.
					
					 They referred to ways for expanding the service in all regions and countries.

articles.title: DPRK Students Prove Successful at Int'l Math Olympiad
articles.content:
DPRK Students Prove Successful at Int'l Math Olympiad
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK students proved successful at the 54th International Math Olympiad.
					 The Olympiad held in Colombia from July 18 to 28 brought together more than 520 students from 97 countries and regions.
					
					 They competed in problems of geometry, algebra, combination and theory of numbers. Students of Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 got high appreciations by satisfactorily solving problems.
					
					 Hong Chung Song and Pak Ji Hyon bagged gold medals.
					
					 Choe Kwang, Choe Song Yong, Kim Song Il and Ri Jong Yol received silver medals.
					
					 They returned home on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Witnesses Exceptionally Heavy Rainfall in July
articles.content:
DPRK Witnesses Exceptionally Heavy Rainfall in July 
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- An average of 651 mm rainfall was observed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in July, the record high in the history of the Meteorological Observation or 2.5 times higher than the average.
					 It rained 1 598 mm in Unsan County, 1 236 mm in Tongchang Country, 1 225 mm in Thaechon County and 1 161 mm in Kusong City in North Phyongan Province, 1 225 mm in Sepho County and 1 216 mm in Phyonggang County, 1 163 mm in Phangyo County and 1 112 mm in Popdong County in Kangwon Province, 1 214 mm in Tongsin County in Jagang Province and 1 174 mm in Sinphyong County in North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 A total of 20 localities in the country experienced over 90 percent of yearly rainfall in the month.
					
					 In the month more than 80 localities in North and South Phyongan provinces, Jagang Province, South Hamgyong Province and Kangwon Province had the largest amount of precipitation ever in the history of the Meteorological Observation.
					
					 The highest precipitation in the month of July was observed in 1963 in the country, with record of 460 mm rainfall.

articles.title: August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement Brisk in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement is in full swing in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The movement, aimed at producing consumer goods with by-products, mainly involves light industrial factories and housewives' work-teams across the country.
					
					 In this regard, KCNA met Kim Hui Jo, a department director of the Ministry of Food and Consumer Goods Industries. 
					
					 Kim said:
					
					 Rounds of commodity shows, held this year, promoted the August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement.
					
					 North Phyongan Province has paid deep attention to developing new products and improving the quality of consumer goods.
					
					 Goods made by housewives' work-teams in Pyongyang and Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province are enjoying popularity among consumers.
					
					 Direct sale stores in Kaechon City, South Phyongan Province and Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province are always bustled with customers as they have quality goods on sale. 
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un underscored the need to turn out varieties of quality consumer goods by intensifying the August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement as in the 1980s.
					
					 A national exhibition of August 3 consumer goods will be held from August 10 this year.

articles.title: Premier Soccer Matches Close
articles.content:
Premier Soccer Matches Close 
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The premier soccer matches took place in the DPRK to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Men and women players widely applied the Korean-style tactical system and playing methods on the basis of a high level of collectivist spirit in every match.
					
					 The Amnokgang Team took the title in men's matches while the Sobaeksu team came first in women's matches.

articles.title: SL Abolition, Release of Prisoners of Conscience Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
SL Abolition, Release of Prisoners of Conscience Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action of Releasing Prisoners of Conscience in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on July 31. It groups 16 human rights and social organizations including the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy.
					 It demanded the release of all prisoners of conscience who were unreasonably arrested by evil laws against human rights and the politically-motivated suppression. 
					
					 A press release was read out at the conference.
					
					 It deplored that the prisoners of conscience are suffering behind bars owing to the "Security Law" (SL) and other evil laws for the mere reason that they took part in candlelight actions and strikes.
					
					 It urged the present regime to stop at once the crackdown upon the human rights, immediately abolish the evil laws and release all the prisoners of conscience.
					
					 At the end of the conference, members of the Joint Action went to Chongwadae and handed over to it the signature paper and petition of people from all walks of life and human rights and social organizations demanding the release of all prisoners of conscience and the list of prisoners of conscience.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Scandals under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Scandals under Fire in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea released a commentary hitting out at the irregularities and corruption committed by the Lee Myung Bak group on July 31.
					 The commentary noted its scandals have been disclosed in succession recently. 
					
					 It branded Lee as a swindler who abused his power as a means for making money.
					
					 It urged the present chief executive and authorities to immediately start an investigation into Lee's scandals.

articles.title: Thorough Probe into Truth about IS's Interference in Election Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Thorough Probe into Truth about IS's Interference in Election Urged in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Catholics in Kwangju region of south Korea released a declaration on the situation on July 31 in demand of thorough probe into the truth about the puppet Intelligence Service's (IS) interference in the election and punishment of those involved in it.
					 The declaration accused the IS of interfering in the election last year and illegally opening the minutes of the south-north summit to public in a bid to divert elsewhere public criticism of its wrong doings.
					
					 Terming it a reckless act of quelling the people's desire for democracy, the declaration urged the present "government" not to disregard such growing anger of the people.
					
					 The declaration demanded a thorough probe into the truth about the case and punishment of those involved in it. It also urged the present chief executive to make an apology for the illegal act.

articles.title: Japanese Cabinet Ministers' Reckless Remarks Censured by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Japanese Cabinet Ministers' Reckless Remarks Censured by S. Korean Paper 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hankuk Ilbo on August 1 carried an editorial denouncing the Japanese Cabinet ministers for letting loose reckless remarks.
					 The editorial said that recently they went the lengths of crying out for rewriting the constitution the way Nazis did, not content with denying the past aggression.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Japan is taking issue with the criticism made by the people of all strata in south Korea of its history of past aggression, a clear indication of national chauvinism, the roots of crimes.
					
					 Japan is not yet forgiven for its past crimes because of the lack of its will to reflect on the crimes committed on those days.
					
					 It will be hard for Japan to shake off its disgrace of being a war criminal state unless it comes to its reason, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: Participants of International Seminar Visit Korean Hall of Chongryon
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Seminar Visit Korean Hall of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Participants in the international seminar to mark the 60th anniversary of the conclusion of the Armistice Agreement visited the Korean Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on July 31. They included former U.S. Attorney General Ramsey Clark, Honorary Professor Micel Chossudovsky of University of Ottawa in Canada, General Secretary of ANSWER Brian Becker and Jong Ki Ryol, extramural professor of Qinghua University of China.
					 Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, had a conversation with them. The chairman expressed thanks to foreign friends for striving to expose the crimes committed by the U.S. troops during the last Korean war and achieve world peace. 
					
					 The Korean people are waging a dynamic struggle for a hopeful future under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and Koreans in Japan are also advancing in unity, keeping pace with them, he noted, and continued:
					
					 The great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un have ceaselessly sent educational aid fund and stipends for the national education of the children of Koreans in Japan. Chongryon is training able intellectuals who will shoulder upon themselves the future in the alien land. 
					
					 Chongryon is firmly protecting the living and rights of Koreans in Japan despite intensified suppression by the Japanese reactionaries.  
					
					 Ho expressed expectation and belief that the foreign friends would continue to extend positive support and cooperation to the patriotic activities of Chongryon and its efforts for global peace and the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 Ramsey Clark said that he was honored to take part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War during his visit to the DPRK. He was greatly encouraged by the DPRK, he stressed.
					
					 Noting that the Korean nation has undergone sufferings resulting from the division for more than half a century, he said this is the tragedy caused by the war.
					
					 Micel Chossudovsky said the Korean war ignited by the U.S. imperialists was not a simple war but a genocide unprecedented in human history, urging the U.S. to admit and make an apology for it.
					
					 The DPRK is exposed to the constant nuclear threat of the U.S., he pointed out, describing the nuclear threat to the DPRK as blackmail against all Koreans in the north and the south.
					
					 Western media are spreading misinformation about the DPRK, he noted, adding that the imperialists' false propaganda is the trite method they have employed for decades.
					
					 He expressed conviction that the Korean people would register great success in their future struggle with an indomitable will.

articles.title: DPRK's V-Day Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's V-Day Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Russia, India, Indonesia, Guinea and Democratic Congo between July 17 and 25 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the victory won by the Korean people in the just war against the U.S. imperialists was an event of weighty importance in the world history.
					
					 The DPRK led by President Kim Il Sung taught a serious lesson to the aggressors and firmly defended the sovereignty and the gains of revolution, he noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India stated it was thanks to the wise leadership of the President that the DPRK less than two years old could win in the war.
					
					 The director of an Indonesian company said Songun politics, almighty treasured sword and victorious banner of the cause of independence, will shed its rays more brightly in the world as Marshal Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 The dean of the Arts Faculty of Dubreka Art College of Guinea denounced the U.S. for trying hard to stifle the DPRK, oblivious of the lesson 60 years ago.
					
					 If a new Korean war breaks out, the U.S. would be bound to meet a miserable end, he said. July 27 will shine forever as the day of victory for the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the Association for Implementing the Juche Philosophy of Democratic Congo praised Kim Il Sung for shattering the U.S. imperialists' myth of "mightiness" with his outstanding strategy, tactics and war methods, warm loving care and deep trust in the servicepersons and people.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory in War Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Korean People's Victory in War Marked in Foreign Countries
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibitions and film shows took place in Russia, Mexico, Brazil and Indonesia from July 25 to 31 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Displayed in the exhibitions were photos documenting the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books on their greatness, photos introducing the true picture of Songun Korea and handicrafts showing the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Films shown included "Korea with Time-honored History" and "Arms of Korea".
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, a brilliant strategist and invincible and iron-willed commander, beat back the invasion by U.S. imperialism and its allies on July 27, 1953 and won a great victory, teaching the revolutionary people across the world the immutable truth that if all the people struggle in firm unity around the leader, they can defeat any formidable enemy.
					
					 The DPRK has emerged a world military power under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, another great Songun commander.
					
					 Nelson Chaves dos Santos, international secretary of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, said Kim Il Sung was an iron-willed brilliant commander who defeated two imperialisms in one generation with his firm revolutionary stand and outstanding strategy and tactics.
					
					 The future of the Workers' Party and people of Korea is rosy as they are led by Kim Jong Un, identical to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he noted.
					
					 A vice-chancellor of Jakarta University said the ＤPRK was strong in the 1950s and is stronger now.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Personages of Syria, Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Personages of Syria, Bulgaria 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Syrian and Bulgarian figures praised the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by leading the war to a victory. 
					 Saber Ballul, a department head of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus of Syria, said in a statement on July 23 that the immortal exploits Kim Il Sung performed for the war victory will shine long in the world history of the anti-imperialist struggle. 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he noted.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people will achieve bigger success in the struggle for prosperity and reunification of the country under Kim Jong Un's leadership. 
					
					 Lyudmil Kostadinov, chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, in a statement on July 26 said that bravery and popular heroism displayed by the Korean people united close around the leader in defeating the boss of the imperialists are an excellent example for the progressive people. 
					
					 We extend once again full support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people, he said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. should be mindful that the DPRK today is not what it used to be in the past. 
					
					 The U.S. should give up the ambition to stifle socialist Korea and choose the way for peaceful co-existence with it. 
					
					 It should immediately dismantle the "UN Command" and stop the arms buildup and joint military drills threatening the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Mongolia
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Mongolia 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibition opened in Ulan Bator on July 26 to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Mongolia. 
					 On display there were photos documenting feats of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing the true picture of Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the creative talents of the Korean people. 
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 The vice-minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism of Mongolia said at the opening ceremony:
					
					 Mongolia and the DPRK have steadily developed the traditional and fraternal relations of friendship despite any change of the situation and will further enrich the bilateral ties in their contents and form. 
					
					 The exhibition will help the Mongolian people deeply understand the heroic effort of the Korean people for building a thriving nation and Korean culture and art on a high level. 
					
					 The Mongolian people will always support the cause of the Korean people to defend their sovereignty, achieve national reunification and build a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: DPRK Book "Rays of Great Victory" Published in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Book "Rays of Great Victory" Published in Russia 
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Book "Rays of Great Victory" was published by the Russian newspaper Patriot on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Seen in the front cover of the book is a picture of President Kim Il Sung waving back to the cheering masses.
					
					 The book contains several articles such as "3 Years of Feats", "Victory" and "Songun, Guarantee of Sovereignty" illustrated with more than 40 photos documenting the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place in Moscow on July 23.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Day Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Day Observed Abroad 
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Meetings, round-table talks, film shows and photo exhibitions took place in Poland, Nigeria, Ethiopia and Iran from July 24 to 26 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War 
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the Korean people in the effort to build a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 Speakers including the chairman of the Polish preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary praised Kim Il Sung for leading the three-year bloody Korean War to a victory. 
					
					 They said the Korean people's victory in the war became a historic occasion in breaking the myth of the U.S. imperialists' "mightiness" and opening a new chapter of the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle. 
					
					 The Korean War was ignited by the U.S. for dominating the world but it suffered a disgraceful defeat for the first time in history, they said, urging it to withdraw its troops from south Korea and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK. 
					
					 The senior special advisor to the governor of the Niger State Government of Nigeria said that the Korean people won the victory in the war against the U.S.-led allied forces. This could be achieved only by the people, strong in faith, who regard the dignity and sovereignty of the country and justice as their life and soul, he said. 
					
					 He extended high respects to Kim Il Sung, who won a great victory in the war. 
					
					 The director of the Construction Department of the Ethiopian Institute of Water Project Design and Supervision and other speakers said that Kim Il Sung achieved a shining victory in the Korean War, greatly encouraging many people around the world in their national liberation struggle.

articles.title: Russian Figure Vows to Widely Introduce Exploits of Great Men
articles.content:
Russian Figure Vows to Widely Introduce Exploits of Great Men 
						
 Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- We will widely introduce the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by winning a victory in the war, feats leader Kim Jong Il performed in the Songun leadership and the greatness of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					 Mikhail Demskov, editor-in-chief of the Russian newspaper Patriot, said this at the releasing ceremony of the book "Rays of Great Victory". The book was published on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The then young DPRK could achieve a victory in the war and became a beacon of hope for the progressive people thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Under the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il the DPRK could bring the U.S. imperialists to their knees and firmly defend Korean-style socialism, symbol of the world people's goodwill, justice and friendship.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a powerful socialist bulwark thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is carrying forward the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. It gives confidence and hope to the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se retrata con veteranos y comandantes participantes en desfile militar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se retrata con veteranos y comandantes participantes en desfile militar 
						
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo una foto de recuerdo con los veteranos de guerra y los comandantes que participaron en el desfile militar por el 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Ri Yong Gil, Mun Kyong Dok y O Il Jong.
					
					El Mariscal felicito calidamente a los participantes en el desfile militar  que hicieron gran aporte a glorificar las imperecederas hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung realizadas por la victoria en guerra y las otras del Dirigente Kim Jong Il hechas en su guia sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y a demostrar el impetu y el inagotable poderio estatal de la Corea del Songun que alcanza victorias orgullosas en la lucha por reunificar la patria y construir un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Se retrato con ellos manifestando la esperanza y conviccion de que seguiran continuando la orgullosa historia de victoria en guerra al lograr nuevos triunfos en la defensa del socialismo y la empresa de construccion de Estado prospero trabajando con el espiritu de lucha heroica demostrado en la decada de 1950.

articles.title: Lider de partido brasileno expone voluntad de desarrollar relaciones con PTC
articles.content:
Lider de partido brasileno expone voluntad de desarrollar relaciones con PTC
						
　Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ACNC) -- Renato Ravello, presidente nacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista Brasileno, se reunio con Ri Hwa Gun, embajador coreano en su pais, quien le realizo el 25 de julio una visita de despedida.
					　En la ocasion, Renato dijo que sirven de gran estimulo para el PCB y la humanidad progresista los exitos que logran el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano en la construccion socialista, la causa de reunificacion de la patria y la lucha antiyanqui bajo la sabia guia del respetado Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					　Prosiguio que el apoyo activo y la solidaridad a la lucha del PTC y el pueblo coreano son noble obligacion e invariable decision de su partido.
					
					　Expuso la determinacion de esforzarse mas por desarrollar las relaciones de amistad entre ambas organizaciones politicas.

articles.title: Delegacion laosiana rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegacion laosiana rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ACNC) -- La delegacion del Comite Central del Frente de Construccion de Lao, encabezada por su presidente Phandoaungchit Vongsa, visito el dia 3 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Los huespedes rindieron el postumo homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de pie en el hall y sus cuerpos en los salones de eternidad.
					
					Luego pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de ordenes recibidas por el Presidente y el Dirigente, carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren usados por ellos hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida en el camino de visitas de orientacion y viajes al extranjero.
					
					Phandoaungchit Vongsa escribio en el libro de visita como sigue:
					
					Estoy muy impresionado luego de visitar el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan donde estan conservados los cuerpos del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					Ellos dedicaron todo lo suyo hasta el ultimo momento de su vida para la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Las relaciones de amistad preparadas por el camarada Kaysone Phomvihane y el Presidente se desarrollan cada dia mas bajo la profunda atencion de los camaradas Choummaly Sayasone y Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Periodistas se reunen con ex corresponsal de Guerra
articles.content:
Periodistas se reunen con ex corresponsal de guerra 
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar aqui el encuentro de los periodistas y hombres de prensa del sector de prensa e informacion con Song Hak Yong, ex corresponsal de guerra de Rodong Sinmun, organo del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Song tomo parte en varios combates durante la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y libro en el frente las actividades de cobertura y escritura.
					
					Esta vez, participo en los festejos del 60o aniversario de la victoria en la guerra coreana y se beneficio de las medidas benevolas tomadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					En la ocasion, Song dijo que los corresponsales de guerra, tomando el pincel en una mano y el fusil en la otra, cumplieron con sus misiones de transmitir los meritos de los combatientes del Ejercito Popular de Corea quienes lucharon valientemente en diferentes campos de combate por el partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Se refirio a que los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il dispensaron gran benevolencia a los corresponsales de guerra quienes registraron meritos en la historia de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria al desarrollar con osadia las actividades de cobertura y escritura en medio de avalancha de balas enemigas.
					
					Encomendo a los periodistas y hombres de prensa que apoyen fielmente las orientaciones del Mariscal y registren sin parar las innovaciones en sus trabajos. 
					
					Cantando con Song la "Cancion de la defensa de la Patria" creada en el tiempo de guerra, los participantes tomaron la decision de desplegar con dinamismo las actividades de prensa, que estimulen la lucha del ejercito y pueblo por cumplir la causa revolucionaria del Juche, al aprender el espiritu y modo de trabajo de los corresponsales de la pasada guerra coreana.

articles.title: Alumnos coreanos obtienen 2 medallas de oro en Olimpiada Internacional de Matematica
articles.content:
Alumnos coreanos obtienen 2 medallas de oro en Olimpiada Internacional de Matematica
						
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los alumnos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea lograron exitos en la 54a Olimpiada Internacional de Matematica efectuada del 18 al 28 de julio en Colombia con la participacion de mas de 520 alumnos provenientes de 97 paises y regiones.
					En la presente olimpiada se presentaron los problemas de las ramas de la geometria, el algebra,  la combinacion y la teoria del numero.
					
					Los matriculados de la Escuela Secundaria No.1 de Pyongyang recibieron una alta  estimacion al resolver con excelencia los problemas.
					
					Hong Chung Song y Pak Ji Hyon, obtuvieron medallas de oro y Choe Kwang, Choe Song Yong, Kim Song Il y Ri Jong Yol, las medallas de plata.
					
					Ellos regresaron el dia 2 a la patria.

articles.title: Militares chinos salvan a campesinos coreanos
articles.content:
Militares chinos salvan a campesinos coreanos
						
Pyongyang, 3 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los militares del batallon de defensa de frontera en la ciudad de Lin Jiang de China salvaron de la muerte a 3 campesinos de la granja cooperativa de Sangjang del distrito de Junggang de la provincia de Jagang de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Las aguas del rio Amnok se incrementaron debido a las lluvias torrenciales caidas en varios dias y empezo a anegarse el dia 25 de julio un islote radicado entre el distrito coreano y la ciudad china arriba citada.
					
					Se hallaban en la agonia los granjeros de la granja en cuestion, quienes fueron al islote para la siembra de vegetales.
					
					Tan pronto como recibiera el aviso, el citado batallon organizo un grupo de salvacion con los  soldados habiles en el rescate de agua y lo envio al islote.
					
					Aunque era dificil para llegar al islote debido a fuerte oleada y viento, los miembros de rescate descubrieron a los granjeros coreanos tras realizar un esfuerzo muy duro.
					
					No haciendo caso de sus vidas los militares chinos salvaron a los coreanos.
					
					Los funcionarios y moradores de la ciudad de Lin Jiang hicieron todo lo posible para el regreso de esos campesinos a la patria.
					
					El secretario del comite del partido en la ciudad dijo que son hermanos los pueblos chinos y coreanos y es el deber del pueblo chino rescatar la vida de los coreanos.
					
					Los granjeros coreanos senalaron que experimentaron los lazos de amistad Corea-China con larga historia y tradicion al ver a los  chinos esforzandose abnegadamente para salvar sus vidas.
